title: FONT CARTAZ
content: PLEASE MAKE SUGGESTIONS ON THAT NEW SOURCE THAT I CREATED. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018235219im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/35259.jpg)
author: mhirosse

comments.content: It's cool. But please fix your CAPS LOCK key.

this alone font this available one in high box.   
Thank you for the suggestion   
Marcio Hirosse

I agree that this font needs a 'clean' variant. It has some interesting letters that would be cool in a non-grunge context (the A in particular). Besides, grunge characters always look better distressed by the designer, as opposed to the type designer. It avoids goofy looking side by side 'random' letters that are exactly the same.

Yes I always try to look for something more aggressive in the drawings that I create and just not to dirty the letter.   
Thank you for the it criticizes   
   
MARCIO
I love this as-is... I agree there are a lot of interesting characters -- like the $. Good stuff!
I'm going to move this to critique. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018235219im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Interesting. At first this whole stencil thing was not really interesting to me. But, it is now growing on me and I'm starting to appreciate the differences. Does your typeface have grungy and not grungy variants?
